content.rendered:
Directed by David Blair.

Written by Jeff Pope.

Cast Leanne Best (Kate). Stephen Merchant (Stephen Port). Memet Ali Alabora (Sami Sak). Samuel Barnett (Ryan Edwards). Michael Jibson (DC Paul Slaymaker). Shaun Thomas (Paul). Giselle Cullinane (Barbara Denham). Rufus Jones (John Pape). Kris Hitchen (Tom). Isabella Laughland (China). Alexa Davies (Kiera). Ben Cartwright (DS Martin O’Donnell). Robert Emms (Ricky). Kate Layden (Sandra). Tim Preston (Anthony Walgate). Paddy Rowan (Jack Taylor). Holly Aird (Jeanette Taylor). David Kennedy (Colin Taylor). Jaime Winstone (Donna Taylor). Stephanie Hyam (Jenny Taylor). Leo Flanagan (Daniel Whitworth). Mollie Winnard (Demi). Ella Kenion (Mandy Pearson). Daniel Ryan (Adam Whitworth). Jack Pierce (ADI Rolf Schamberger). Michael Keogh (Dispatcher). Frankie Wilson (Barking Police Officer 1). Paul Barnhill (Funeral Celebrant). Rupert Hill (Barking Police Officer 4). Dan Linney (Front Desk Officer). Andy Gathergood (Medway Police Officer). Daniel Jillings (Barking Police Officer 5). Rachel Dale (Hull Police Officer). Nadia Clifford (Barking Police Officer 2). Chris Brazier (Rafael Costa). Jason Done (Barking Police Sergeant). Emma Naomi (Barking Police Officer 3). Jakub Svec (Gabriel Kovari).

Language English.

Producers Serena Cullen. Carolyn Parry-Jones. Ken Horn. Jeff Pope.

Production British Broadcasting Corporation (BBC). ITV Studios.

No. of Seasons 1

No. of Episodes 3

Status Finished (4)
